name: Number Battle - fun game (puzzle) with numbers. Show the erudition, play with friends
name_original: Number Battle - fun game (puzzle) with numbers. Show the erudition, play with friends
description:
Want to play in something interesting? Not against simple and fascinating puzzles? Then this game is for you.

In the game you need to remove numbers from the field. You can choose the numbers only within a certain line or column. Each removed number counted as points. The game goal - to collect more points than the opponent.

GAME FEATURES:
- Addictive gameplay
- Singleplayer against the AI
- Play together with your friends
- Many interesting levels
- Ratings in Game Center

Try to install right now and you can not tear youself away from the game!
